metadata.title: CVE-2016-7969 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
The wrap_lines_smart function in ass_render.c in libass before 0.13.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via unspecified vectors, related to "0/3 line wrapping equalization." It was discovered that LibASS incorrectly handled certain ASS files. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-7969` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libass9 - 1:0.13.4-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libass package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.13.4-2').
